title: Inter Miami 1-0 Charlotte FC: Hosts snatch win after Ustari red card
description: Inter Miami survived goalkeeper Oscar Ustari’s first-half red card to snatch a 1-0 victory over Charlotte FC and move up to second in the Eastern Conference. Tadeo Allende scored the only goal 17 seconds after the break, combining brilliantly with Luis Suarez to earn Javier Mascherano his second MLS win since taking charge.
